events.EventDescription:
Beogradski Tribute BIJELO DUGME: šestočlani sastav koji verno predstavlja najpoznatiji repertoar legendarnih Dugmića, na istovetan način izvodeći njihove hitove.
Vokal Boris Kraguljac, je rođeni Sarajlija  te se karakteristike sarajevske pop-rok škole prepoznaju u njegovom glasu, a originalnost vokala i pratećih vokala upotpunjuju osećaj zahvaljujući jedinstvenoj Ljiljani Radovanović... Bubnjar Ivan Ranković - Raka je nekadašnji član grupe EKV a i ostali članovi benda su odlični klupski muzičari.
Oni su: Boris Kraguljac, Milos Jovanovic, Milan Daković, Ivan Ranković, Ljiljana Radovanovic, Nemanja Cvijović.
Pozivamo sve naše prijatelje, pratioce i fanove koji vole Bijelo dugme i pesme koje su obeležile '70-e, '80-e... da dođu i uživaju sa nama u divnim pesmama i hitovima.

Soul Kitchen sastav čini ekipa sjajnih muzičara, koji sviraju samo odabrani soul, funk i r'n'b.
Sanja Beauty Queens Bogosavljević, vokal
Marko Vlahović, vokal
Kristijan Mlačak - Kris, tenor sax
Milan Savić - Savcho, alto sax
Srđan Dunkić - Džoni, bubanj
Aleksandar Buzadžić - Buzge, sint
Predrag Kozomara - Peca, gitara
DragAn Ivanović, bas

Lost Paris Tapes (the Doors Tribute bend) je iz Vrbasa. Čine ga četiri iskusna muzicara koji su se skupili krajem 2011 da sviraju pesme benda The Doors. Od svog početka bend je prošao kroz razne periode, kako kroz promenu dvojice gitarista, pa do dolaska novog (ujedno i stalnog člana benda), pa sve do rada u studiju Roberta Telčera (Partibrejkers ,Veliki Prezir), i snimanja pet numera. Ideja za ovaj muzički projekat prikazala se kao veliki uspeh za nas, najviše u moralnom polgedu, a samim time, odrazilo se na neverovatnu publiku koju 'the DOORS bend ima svih ovih decenija'. Činjenica je da bend uveliko radi po celom regionu, i uskoro se čeka pozitivan znak za nastupe po Evropi. Bend ujedno čine; Poldruhi Fedja (vocal), Borislav Kuga (piano,bass piano), Pesalj Pavle (guitar), Marko Kravic (drum).

Beogradski rege pioniri i legende domaće scene Del Arno Bend, prvi put će svirati u Zemunu 9.decembra u klubu Fest! 

Prošle godine Del Arno Bend obeležio je prvih 30 godina rada i to na najbolji mogući način – koncertima i novim izdanjima! Nakon duge diskografske pauze najpre su uradili singl „Ljut sam“, a zatim obradovali svoje fanove Box Set izdanjem „Igraj dok te ne sruše – prvih 30 godina“. Ubrzo nakon toga usledio je i  novi singl „Još uvek ima nade“ koji je nastao kao rezultat dugogodišnje saradnje benda sa Hornsmanom Kojotom. Rad na novom albumu nastavljaju ove jeseni, sa sastavom “Jenđe” rade na projektu koji će biti jedinstven na ovim prostorima. 

Da nemaju nameru da stanu i da, kako i sami kažu – tek počinju, dokazali su i izuzetno aktivnom koncertnom sezonom. U uspešnoj godini koja je iza njih obišli su neke od najvećih festivala u regionu: Love Fest, Exit, Nišville, Beer Fest, a  nedavno su otvorili i novu sezonu u Božidarcu. 
I dalje puni energije i rešeni da tek pokažu koliko je i snage i kreativnosti u njima, nastavljaju koncertnu sezonu prvim nastupom u klubu Fest!
„Ovo će biti prvi koncert ikada Del Arno Benda u Zemunu…“ konstatuju i dodaju “Dođite da zajedno napravimo istoriju!“ 

Budite i vi deo istorije, dođite na prvi koncert Del Arno Benda u Zemunu, 9.decembra u 22h u klubu Fest! 

Ulaznice su u pretprodaji u klubu Fest po ceni od 700 dinara.

LOCO je beogradski cover band koji dugi niz godina promovise ideju dobre zabave kroz autenticno i energicno izvodjenje najkvalitetnijih numera svetskog muzickog nasledja. Kako je dugi niz godina dovodio do promene clanova, tako je i LOCO menjao svoj zvuk i sazrevao.
Clanovi benda se Igor Simic- vokal,
 Jovana Repovic - Vokal, 
Jovan Satric - bubnjevi, 
Goran Radovanovic - bas gitara, 
Ivan Zivanovic - klavijature & vokali,
 Nikola Jankovic - gitara.

events.EventName: Above Us The Waves at Fest
events.EventDescription:
"Above us The Waves'' is a five-piece band from Kavala, Greece. A.U.T.W.'s sound contains elements of melodic death metal and hardcore focused on heavy riffing and strong melodies.
The band was formed in 2009 by Vasilis (Guitars) and after a few member changes, Dinos (Bass), George (Guitars), Vangelis (Vocals) and Stratos (Drums) completed the current lineup.
Following a demo cd(2009), a promo EP(2011) and many live shows, A.U.T.W. released their debut album “Anchors Aweigh” via the Athens, GR based label Spreading Dysphoria Industries. The album gained great reviews and was featured on RockHard, Metal Hammer and was also chosen as one of the top Greek metal release of 2013 by Sonik magazine. 
Their energetic live performances have gained them a growing following and many headline shows and tours around Greece and South East Europe. They have also appeared as support act for well-established bands like Unearth, Comeback Kid, Caliban, Defeater, Rotting Christ, Paul Di Anno, Septic Flesh etc. and have appeared on festivals like Rock-Off (Istanbul, 2014) w/ Megadeth, HIM, Gojira, Amon Amarth etc. and as a headline act on Greek festivals (Defcon, New Long etc.).
2017 has found the band in the studio working on their sophomore album titled Rough on High Seas. Their latest endeavor, mixed and mastered by Jay Maas (Defeater, Bane, Vanna, Capsize and more), marks a step ahead for the sound of the band, focused on a more organic sound, intense lyrics and songwriting, keeping though their melodic approach intact and is scheduled for release in November 2017 via Made of Stone records.

The first leg of the “Rough on High seas tour” aims to bring a taste of the upcoming album (played in its entirety) to appreciators of quality extreme music. Mosh freely!

Ulaz 300 dinara
Info /rezervacije stolova na 063 700 81 50

ЯйцЫ Fаберже- Yaitsi Faberge su vodeća grupa ruske pank- ska scene.
Bend (bukvalni prevod ''ekipa) je osnovan 2003. u Orelu, i do danas njihova diskografija broji 5 albuma i jedan maksi singl.
Album  «Провокация»/Provokacija objavljen je za poznatu (legendarnu) diskografsku kuću ''Moroz records'', a album "Вещдоки" za još poznatiji Studio ''Sojuz''.
 Pored toga, u prodaji se može naći i zvanična MP3 kompilacija pesama sa prva tri albuma.
Danas,, grupa sarađuje sa najpoznatijom izdavačkom kućom u zemlji- Soyuz Mjuzik (СОЮЗ Мьюзик).
Bend na svojim koncertima praktikuje zajedničke nastupe kako sa domaćim, tako i sa evropskim i svetskim zvezdama: The Exploited (Škotska), MoskovSKAya (Nemačka), Haggis (Norveška), Skaladdin (Švajcarska), Alaska (Švajcarska), Doedel Haie (Nemačka), Lюk (Ukrajina). 

ЯйцЫ Fаберже učestvovali su i na velikom ruskom rok festivalu «НАШЕствие» (2008–2011).

Pesma «Все на футбол» (Svi na fudbal) pojavljuje se na zvaničnom saundtreku za film  «Околофутбола»,a reditelj Grigorij Ivancov snimio je u Orelu u avgustu 2013. godine spot za ovu pesmu.

Članovi benda:
 Нильс/Nils (vokal)
Гучок7Gučok (bubnjevi)
Петя7Petya 
Алим/Alim (gitara)
Стас «Ptitza»/Stas ''Ptica'' (trombon)
Дима/Dima (tenor- saksofon)
Паспарту/Paspartu (truba)
Сергей «Ван Дам» Дёмин/Sergej ''Van Dam'' Djomin (harmonika)

Diskografija:

В Крутую (2006)
Провокация (Moroz Records, 2007)
Любовь и Ненависть (2010)
Корсары (maksi- singl, 2013)
Вещдоки (Союз-Мьюзик 2017)

events.EventName: Stuttgart Online u Klubu Fest u Zemunu
events.EventDescription:
Štutgarti u FESTu, u najjačoj postavi do sad, u petak 20. oktobra!
Ulaz 400 dinara
Info/rezervacije stolova na 063 700 81 50

Podsećanja radi, grupa Stuttgart Online postoji od 2006. godine, izdali su dva albuma “Radost svakom domaćinstvu” i “Prava stvar”, a novi singl je deo trećeg, pod nazivom “Štutgart na vezi”, čije se objavljivanje u celini planira do kraja godine.

“Grupa ostaje verna garažnom rokenrol zvuku, sve pesme za kompletiranje 3. albuma su snimljene i spremne. Očekujemo do kraja godine da se objavi kompletan materijal”, potvrdili su nam iz Stuttgart Onlinea, obećavajući punokrvnu rokenrol svirku u FESTu:
“Mislimo da nigde ne cvjetaju ruže i da svugde moraju da se plate računi i ne samo oni. Često se i skuplje plaća cena uspeha. Mi se trudimo da sebi olakšamo život i učinimo ga podnošljivijim. A sve je moguće, pa i baviti se rokenrolom na Balkanu, verujte nam na reč”, optimistični su Bojan, Demir i Marko.

events.EventName: Exist Immortal *ENG w/ For The Wicked *ROM @Klub FEST
events.EventDescription:
Exist Immortal
The sound of London’s Exist Immortal is impressive – their genre spanning, hook laden melodic metal is both unique and imaginative. Since releasing their full length debut Darkness of and Age in 2014 Exist Immortal haven’t sat around doing nothing. Playing several festivals, countless tours and some of the biggest names in the underground from SikTh to Heart of a Coward, to Fallujah and Circles. Their brand of modern metal has taken them from India to Italy and a multitude of countries in between. The new album Breathe was release October 28th 2016 on Primordial Records and has been received extremely well by both fans and press. Metal Hammer wrote this in their (8/10) review The quintet delight the senses from the jump-off with their ability to construct expansive sonic soundscaped. Hypnotising electronice permeates opener saviour and plaintive earworm In Hindsight, but it’s frontman Meyrick de la Fuente’s soaring vocals layered over undulating riffage that truly stirs the soul. Being confirmed for multiple festivals including UK Tech Fest and Complexity Fest Exist Immortal is well on its way to become a force to be reckoned with.

For The Wicked
Originated in Cluj-Napoca, For the Wicked is one of the most interesting and ambitious metal band appearances on the metal scene in Romania, winning several awards as evidenced in the first year of existence (2015): Best Metal Newcomer at Metalhead Awards, Grand Prize at Posada Rock and Low5Bass Studio award at Gbob Romania. Although it consists of young musicians, some of whom already have an important musical experience (Dirty Shirt, Guerrillas, 13Rituals, Divided By Perception, Blood Print, etc ...), they have managed to prove the quality of their first EP titled Trust your Heart: https://weareforthewicked.bandcamp.com/ 
For the Wicked stuns with a modern metalcore, combining heavy riffs with aggressive vocals and catchy choruses, all dressed in a production at international standards: mastering was done in the United States by Joey Sturgis (Asking Alexandria, Emmure, The Devil Wears Prada), while recording and mixing was dealt by the band leader Vlad Bornuz (Diamonds Are Forever, Scars of the Story), at Dark Vision Digital Studion in Cluj-Napoca. Lyric video was produced by Dawning Media Productions and artwork by Resize Media (Luna Amara, Diamonds Are Forever, Breathelast, Emil, etc ...). In less than six months after launch, the band performed an important series of concerts in Romania, including Maximum Rock festival, Fire in the Park, Barock Fest, Remember Rock, Posada and #ImpreunaRezistam(Cluj-Napoca). Last but not least, theyhave shared the scene with important metal bands like: Suicide Silence (SUA), Dirty Shirt (Ro), Jinjer (Ukr), Lostbone (Pol) , When Reason Collaps (Fr), To Kill Achilles(UK) and Helia(RSM).

Ulaz 350 rsd

events.EventName: SNTS / Sacred Court, Horizontal Ground, Berlin
events.EventDescription:
SNTS, an anonymous producer with a gritty, heads­down style of techno and a focus on vinyl! 

LINE UP > > >
Kristina Lalic
CONCRETE DJz
RAR (Music Reactions)

SNTS first surfaced in late 2012. He's been behind two record trilogies, Chapters and Scenes, issued through his self­titled label, and also earned appearances on Horizontal Ground and Edit Select Records.

Techno is well known for taking inspiration from cold, harsh environments. The genre complements the ideas of Gothicism and Brutalism perfectly, and none so much as the albums from enigmatic German producer, SNTS. 

In his performances SNTS showcases knack for creating a dark ambience – it is easy to imagine oneself wandering through barren, crumbling cathedral ruins, mist billowing out of hidden crevices, whilst a malevolent presence lurks just out of sight in the shadows. We all witnessed that epic performance of his at Exit festival and we are hungry for more!

https://soundcloud.com/sntsrecords

MORE INFO TBA

Kao u Detroitu pre skoro pola veka, grad Torino na severu Italije poslednje dve decenije prolazi  kroz društveno socijalnu metamorfozu. Promene su bile iznenadne i izazovne za kontekst u kome stasava torinska omladina. U traganju za smislom i u nameri da definišu sopstveno određenje, razne generacije privučene underground supkulturom, otkrivaju napuštene fabrike i magacine i prilagođavaju ih klupskoj muzičkoj kulturi. Sirovi zvuk fabričkih mašina zamenjen je sirovim tehno frekvencijama.

    Iz takve sredine, u beogradski tehno hram Drugstore Beograd nam dolazi mlad, dinamičan, internacionalno priznat duo, Boston 168, projekat koji čine Sergio Pace i Vincenzo Ferramosca.

     Sergio i Vincenzo su dugogodišnji prijatelji koji su nakon nekoliko godina samostalnih karijera zaključili da ih više inspiriše zajednički rad. Kreativni impuls i teritorija na kojoj se ovaj dvojac muzički kreće pripada žanru acid tehna, koji neprestano inoviraju novi zvucima i semplovima kombinujući ih sa eksperimentom na polju aranžmana tehno muzike, uglavnom uz korišćenje analogne muzičke elektronske opreme i instrumenata.

     2010. godine, osnovali su izdavačku kuću "Old and Young" , kroz koju plasiraju muzičke radove koji su proizvod starih klupskih muzičkih postulata, ali u kombinaciji sa savremenim doživljajem elektronskog tehno zvuka. 

     U svom radu, kao i na live nastupima koriste i legendarne stare analogne mašine Roland, Korg, Moog. Iza sebe imaju desetine muzičkih izdanja, od kojih neke na etiketama Enemy, Involve, Oddeven, Attic.

https://www.mixcloud.com/technoscene-crew/techno-scene-story-1-boston-168/
http://equipboard.com/pros/boston-168

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

     Boston 168 is a duo of two Italian men, Vincenzo Ferramosca and Sergio Pace, both based in Turin. 

     The description of the music of Boston 168 contains various sides: ranging from psychedelic FX to twisted acid sounds, all supported by the heartbeat of pounding techno. Their own words for their work a little bit harder and probably straight to the point: “Acid, dirty and rotten. A flow that comes directly from the analogue machines.” While this clarification makes good sense to people that hear their releases, their influences go further than only techno. It’s no surprise that they have a preference for forward thinking artists like Pink Floyd, Kraftwerk and Aphex Twin, who can simply can be called the avant-garde artists of their generations. 

     When speaking of techno, their list of big influential names gets even longer, filled with living legends like Underground Resistance, Joey Beltram, Plastikman, Armando and many others who mainly got their fame in the 80’s and 90’s. About the current stream of techno prodigies they said this: “Nowadays, it’s difficult to say who we like, because there are so many, but if we were to name a few we would say Milton Bradley, Donato Dozzy, Drvg Cvltvre and Polar Inertia.”

     Just like the local scene contributes to the flourishing of local clubs and nightlife related businesses, this duo contributed to the development of clubs in Turin like Bunker, Chalet, Audiodrome, Rush and festivals Kappa Futur, Club to Club and Movement, thus taking the fate and image of their hometown into their own hands.

     We don’t quite have a factory for our guests to transform and show us what they do. We have something better, a slaughterhouse. Vincenzo and Sergio, we are waiting for you!

     Two scientists and a live set for a new dawn of Acid Techno.


TRIII
Boston 168
DJ Dusan Kacarevic - TRIII
Mirko Lazarevic - TRIII
DJ Boža Podunavac - TRIII
Gorgia
Ana Rs
Rope
http://www.triii.rs/
https://www.mixcloud.com/TRIII/
https://www.instagram.com/triii_rs/
https://twitter.com/TRIII_rs/

events.EventName: REEKO / Pole Group ES, ERIKA / I.T. US
events.EventDescription:
Since you like it ruff and from both ends we’re preparing another harsh techno event on two stages. We’re excited to announce guests from Spain and the US who will join us on November 24th, spill sticky dark loops and tell us everything they know about techno.
 
BIG ROOM

Reeko (Pole Group, Mental Disorder / ES)
Juan Rico started Djing in 1997, only 5 years before his international breakthrough with his first release for Emergence in 2002. The very next year he started his own label Mental Disorder under which he had 12 releases. In 2005 Reeko added Evidence, another label that served him as a drill to the darkest corners of the psyche. Legends such as Function and Paul Bailey released music on Evidence. Oscar Mulero, Asturian, Exium and Christina Wünsch are Reeko’s teammates in the PoleGroup. Reeko likes to earn your trust slowly and then take you to the corners of elite Hispanic techno. 
https://soundcloud.com/reeko

Regen (Ilian Tape / DE)
Here’s a local with an uncomparable approach and taste in techno. Miloš Pavlović has been a local favorite for so long and the ones who fall in love with his sets have no option but to wait for one of his visits from Berlin. How curious is the fact that Regen started playing music in 1997, just like Juan Rico?! We’ll be more than excited to compare the two peers as they emit traditional techno sets in the big room.
https://soundcloud.com/regenen

BLACK ROOM

Erika (Interdimensional Transmissions / US)
Whether you know her as Erika, one half of Ectomorph or Red Bull Radio co-host, you will hear Detroit in everything Erika does. Erika’s interest in the unseen and spiritual in combination with her scientific genes takes her to the walls of Drugstore’s black room where she will express herself and tell us more about her conversations with machines. Up until early 2016 Erika was running erika.net, one of internet's first freeform radio stations.
https://soundcloud.com/resident-advisor/ra589-erika

Luka Concrete (CONCRETE DJz / SR)
Luka is one of the founders of the Concrete Djz collective, one of the most active crews dedicated to sharing electronic music and one of the rare ones which stand the test of time and have a solid following in Serbia. Luka has shared the stage with champs such as CJ Bolland, Oscar Mulero, The Advent and many others. 
https://soundcloud.com/concrete-djz

Bojan Vukmirović (CONCRETE DJz / SR)
Luka’s teammate in Concrete Djz, Bojan released Mandatory EP last year, a selection of tracks which tell everything you need to know about his two-and-a-half decade long dedication to electronic music. 
https://soundcloud.com/bojan-vukmirovic

TICKET INFO TO BE ANNOUNCED

events.EventName: Modular Journey w/ SHDW & Obscure Shape at §
events.EventDescription:
With the aftertaste still strong from September Modular Journey - when Regal, Avoid, TKNO, Miles Nitch and Mobisch literally blew us away - we couldn't think of a better time to announce our next big event!

Keith Carnal and Regal had their first ever gigs in Belgrade on our parties, and now it's time for the talented German duo SHDW & Obscure Shape to pay us a visit - playing an extraordinary 4 HOURS SET!

Third Modular Journey in Serbia is happening November 17th, in Drugstore Beograd. Oh, it's so on!

Line up:
• SHDW & Obscure Shape
• TKNO
• Smt#nG
• Miles Nitch

Tickets coming soon on Eventim Serbia's website and in all of their outlets.

• • • 

Dok je aftertaste još uvek jak od septembarskog Modular Journey-ja - kada su nas Regal, Avoid, TKNO, Miles Nitch i Mobisch doslovno oduvali - ne možemo zamisliti bolji trenutak da najavimo naš naredni veliki događaj!

Nakon što su Keith Carnal i Regal imali svoje prve nastupe u Beogradu na našim žurkama, stiže nam i talentovani nemački duo SHDW & Obscure Shape, koji će nam se predstaviti izvanrednim ČETVOROČASOVNIM SETOM!

Treći Modular Journey u Srbiji zakazan je za 17. novembar, u klubu Drugstore!

Line up:
• SHDW & Obscure Shape
• TKNO
• Smt#nG
• Miles Nitch

Karte stižu uskoro na sajt Eventim Serbia i u sve njihove prodajne objekte.

events.EventName: Apgrade with Recondite & DJ Tennis / Drugstore Beograd
events.EventDescription:
Recondite, intrigantni producent i jedan od predvodnika nove generacije hedlajnera na globalnoj elektronskoj sceni, i Dj Tennis, italijanski mastermind i osnivač "Life & Death" etikete, nastupiće zajedno na velikom Apgrade događaju 11. novembra u beogradskoj tehno katedrali, Drugstore Beograd. Nakon što je pre tačno godinu dana ostavio dubok trag kao nezvanični "pobednik" prošlog Apgrade Weekenda, Recondite se u Beograd vraća sa potpuno novim, neobjavljenim materijalom, za koji se već sad očekuje da osvoji svetsku scenu u 2018. godini! I DJ Tennis u Srbiju, i to premijerno, dolazi na vrhuncu karijere, sa novim miks albumom iz prestižne DJ-Kicks serije, koja sa pravom važi za najdugovečniju na elektronskoj sceni. Pridružiće im se i naš veliki DJ majstor Dejan Milicevic, koji u Hangar ulazi sa novim albumom "Summation", objavljenim za kultni "Plastic City", a pored njega domaću podršku za veliki, novembarski Apgrade pružiće i subotički producent u usponu, Dj Chrono, čija izdanja vrte Richie Hawtin i Marco Carola, uz uspeh na više DJ takmičenja uključujući i pobednički miks na godišnjem Tuborg konkursu.

Ulaznice/Tickets: 
Regular: 890 RSD

www.Gigstix.com
www.Eventim.rs

Dasha Rush, the brutal but tender sonar lady will unravel the nuances of techno in her third visit to Drugstore.

LINE UP > > > 
Dasha Rush
Filip Xavi
Kaen
Artem Fedula


We were happy to host her in 2014 and 2015 and to enjoy in her collaboration with our resident Filip Xavi. From sweltering early-hours techno, rife with booming low-end and mind-bending atmospherics to deploying rough-shod, 4/4 drums and twisting alien bleeps to devastating effect, this Moscow-born has always been our chosen darling. Among releases on labels like Sonic Groove and Raster Noton, and collaborations with few others, still majority of her work is released on her own imprint Fullpanda Records and more experimental sub-label Hunger to Create. 

Her last album on Raster-Noton, Sleepstep – Sonar Poems For My Sleepless Friends, could be a metaphor for her musical work: "These 16 pieces are transmissions from that state between sleep and wakefulness," said Tony Naylor, a reflection of the in- between zones her music often inhabits. Not being one thing or the other is vitally important to Rush, which goes hand-in-hand with her strong independent streak. In past years she is enlarging the field of her activities to Av shows and installations.  
To sum up, Dasha is a respected and well-traveled Live performer, electronic music composer, sound artist and Dj, but her work is equally focused away from the dance floor, and sometimes away from the music itself. 

https://fullpandarecords.bandcamp.com
https://soundcloud.com/dasha-rush

More info soon

As promised - this season is vicious from the start.

Stay in tune, things are just getting serious.
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

After the blast with Francois X, we give you our new resident from the Concrete Music crew thet will dive all night long with us - the great Antigone.


Antigone is an emblematic figure at the French Techno scene and a young Parisian artist who quickly became highly acclaimed in the world of electronic music. 

An astral traveller obsessed with records and collecting, Antigone started as a producer and released his first EP „Forbidden works“ for Concrete Re-form. 
Afterwards came „Menace of Species“ released on CONCRETE music and releases on DEMENT3D a label owned by his very good friend Francois X. 
One of his most popular Ep’s is „The Day the Sky Fell In“ which is a perfect example of his hypnotic, melancholic and melodic style – a very personal way of creating dreamy,trancy melodies – a style that gained him a meteoric ascent and a very warm reception. 
For him, Dj sets are about creating an atmosphere and musical storytelling, as well as mixing hard and deep atmospheric techno. Those are the qualities that earned him a residency at Concrete and many gigs all around the world at clubs like Berghain, Rex, Tresor, Fuse...

2016 and 2017 are going great for Antigone. He made a track on Pole Group, released an EP „ We move as one“ with Francois X and an EP „Saudade“ on Token, made a remix with Shlomo for AWB and reworked Slam’s classic « Positive Education » for the 25th Soma Quality recordings anniversary. «  Ostitano », the 4th ep, on his mother label Token will be released the 8th of September followed up by an album in 2018.

http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/antigone
http://soundcloud.com/antigone
http://www.discogs.com/artist/Antigone

events.EventName: Akua Naru 26.10. Klub Drugstore | Terminal2018 Check in Belgrade
events.EventDescription:
U sklopu promocije Terminal Music& Arts Festivala beogradska publika će po prvi put imati priliku da sluša jednu od vodećih ženskih hip-hop vokala – Akua Naru. U okviru evropske turneje “When The Joy Comes” Akua Naru će sa svojim bendom u srpskoj prestonici promovisati novi album. 

Njena muzika predstavlja kombinaciju hip hopa, jazz-a i soula. Sebe opisuje kao političku hip-hop umetnicu, aktivistkinju, zaljubljenicu u muziku koja govori iz duše… Njen zvuk uporedjuju sa flow-om Rakima, poetikom Lauren Hill i, najposle, u jedinstvenoj snazi da govori u ime afro-amerikanki, sa Ninom Simon. Akua smelo kombinuje “novu” i “staru” školu, braneći svoje stavove unikatnim metaforama. 

U svojoj karijeri nastupala je sa Tony Allen-om bubnjarem Fela Kuti-ja, hip hop grupom “The Lords of The Underground”, Wax Tailor-om, Angelique Kidjo, “Questlove”-om iz The Rootsa itd…
Akua iza sebe ima tri albuma, “The Journey Aflame”, “Live and Aflame Sessions”, “The Miner's Canary”, kao i širom sveta poznate hitove “Poetry: How Does It Feel?” i “The world is listening”.

Promo karte po ceni od 800 RSD mogu se kupiti do 08.10.2017. u svim prodajnim mestima Gigstix-a i Eventim-a.
Redovna prodaja karata je po ceni od 1.000 RSD, dok će na ulazu koštati 1200RSD. 

www.terminalfest.org

Došlo je vreme da ponovimo sada već tradicionalno okupljanje ljubitelja najjačeg gasa u hramu Miminog repa, klubu Drugstore. Velika napuštena fabrika je nešto što bi BFOĐ uvek izabrale pre separea, svetla i gomile lepo sređenih ljudi kojima je više neprijatno nego što uživaju u izlasku. Ovo je mesto gde se dolazi da se utopi u masu sličnu sebi koja je došla da se iskače, izdere, izigra, jednom rečju - izdivlja. Ovo je muzika koja daje povod za loženje i kurčenje, ali i za bleju i opuštanje. Ovo je događaj od najvažnijeg kulturnog značaja za omladinu u Beogradu.

Ove godine smo pripremili mnogo iznenađenja, između ostalog i vrlo specijalne goste i vrednu nagradu za jedno takmičenje... Pratite događaj da biste sve saznali prvi!

22h slikanje i potpisivanje
00h početak koncerta
02h početak aftera

Ladies, gents,
We sure know how you love making history. For the first time in Belgrade, it is with great honour we welcome two bigwigs of German House music. So take a break, take a deep breath – and allow yourself to feel the chills when their sensual tunes start carrying your minds away.
This night is organised in collaboration with our friends House Is OK label!

LINE UP >>>

Roman Flügel
Homeboy
Kristijan Molnar



>> ROMAN FLÜGEL (Frankfurt, DEU)

It all started back like any fantasized techno tale could have. Christmas 87’ in the quiet city of Darmstadt, Hesse county, Germany; a seemingly ordinary kid unwrapped his older brother’s gift and discovered a Streetsounds’ Chicago Trax compilation. Spellbound by the groovy, warming sounds of new dance music, he decided to drop it all and start composing himself. 30 years later, Roman Flügel is now recognized worldwide as one of the most influential minds to have ever moulded the German electronic scene. Having navigated the scene for decades under various aliases (Alter Ego, Soylent Green, Roman IV…) either as DJ, live performer, remixer or producer, Flügel is also responsible for co-founding the prestigious labels Ongaku, Klang Electronik and Playhouse – comfy homes to his long-time acquaintances Isolée, Losoul and Villalobos to name just a few. Somehow, the main issue with geniuses always boils down to the same old: free spirits can’t be jailed and their music can’t really be pigeonholed. Leaping with ease from pulpy acid to pristine deep house, right through to hardcore breakbeat if not uncluttered minimal techno, Flügel is one of those happy fews gifted with the power to take anything in their stride and turn it into art. There’s thus no knowing what Flügel holds exactly in store for us this time, but a certainty: a guy who never failed to galvanize the crowds of Frankfurt’s Robert Johnson, Ibiza’s Amnesia and Berlin’s infamous Berghain for countless years in a row shouldn’t meet any problem turning Belgrade upside down on that day.
http://romanfluegel.de/
https://soundcloud.com/roman-fluegel

>> HOMEBOY (Berlin, DEU)

His name might sound familiar to you, and rightfully so. Before settling down in the world’s techno capital, Marko Pelaic was born and raised on the pristine coasts of neighbouring Croatia. Cruising around illustrious Barbarella’s and its sisters countless summers running, soaking up their hedonistic vibes as much as the ambient boiling heat, he soon dedicated himself to composing his own contagiously playful, danceable music.  After a short spell of experimentations, dabbling with raves and bands while listening to drum’n’bass and trip-hop, moving ceaselessly in between the Dalmatian coast, Zagreb and Germany, Homeboy found a definitive shelter in one of Berlin’s most exciting clubs: Salon Zur Wilden Renate. A resident since 2015, he focused on forging and refining his own musical style, until reaching absolute singularity. Intermingling influences from Berlin’s frenetic techno, Adriatic upbeat dance, and a few other oddities in between, he constructs an unexpectedly smooth and groovy soundscape which never fails to make the hearts melt and the bodies get closer. 
https://www.facebook.com/homeboyhomeboyhomeboy/
https://soundcloud.com/homeboyhomeboy

>> KRISTIJAN MOLNAR (Belgrade, SRB)

Kristijan Molnar is one of the favorite DJ’s of Belgrade audience that has a recipe for an always tonic and crowded party. Primarily known and respected for his Christallization Radio show, Kristijan is devoted to promoting gripping and exciting acts and broadcasting a wide range of saucy music; from deep techno, twisted disco, NYC house, weirdo-dark and modern wave, bitter beats or sweet soul. A fusion of dance music from all around the world can be heard in his bang-up all-nighters, mainly in Drugstore, 20/44 in Belgrade or in Zagreb’s Masters where he holds the residencies. Since 2006 when he started his adventure into the world of electronic music, and especially after the deal with FM station, Kristijan is a constant on Serbia’s music scene and major electronic events. In addition, his international career is getting stronger with performances in Netherlands, Switzerland, France, Cyprus and Croatia. Having a specific chameleon-like quality about his DJ-ing, Kristijan manages to adapt perfectly to every event and give it a nifty twist of his own. Parties that will long be remembered are Stereotip, the closing of the Dance arena on the Exit festival, his gigs on the Sonus festival, Lovefest, Sea Dance, as well as the H A ï K U party in Paris. He shared the DJ booth with big and mighty names such as Black Coffee, Âme, Rødhåd, Dixon, Morphosis, Jeff Mills, Red Axes, Tale of Us, Job Jobse and more. Being jauntily versatile, always positive, and describing himself as a primarily curious DJ, he will never fail to spice up the gig and create a smashing atmosphere for a broad range of audience.
https://www.facebook.com/djkristijanmolnar/
https://soundcloud.com/kristijanmolnar

GRAB TICKETS HERE >>> https://goo.gl/cVykki Eventim Serbia
early birds 700 rsd SOLD OUT
regular price 900 rsd
at the door 1000 rsd before midnight and 1200 rsd after midnight

Mirko Lazareviće obeležiće svojih 20 godina aktivnosti na elektronskoj sceni u subotu, 21. oktobra u klubu KPTM u prisustvu bliskih prijatelja i kolega sa kojima je najčešće sarađivao- DJ Slavka, Dušan Kačarević, Vladimir Erdber i Boža Podunavac.

Mirkova ljubav prema muzici nastala je u njegovoj porodici u kojoj je zauzimala značajno mesto. Davne 1997. godine, Mirko je aktivno počeo da se bavi di-džejingom kada ga je DJ Slavka pozvala da sa njom nastupa u klubu Omen, što je bila i njegova životna prekretnica - Mirko je od tada stalni akter na klupskoj sceni Srbije.                                                                     

Tokom 20 godina svoje karijere izgradio je karakterističan stil, stekavši reputaciju di-džeja koji ne pristaje na kompromis pri puštanju muzike. "Ne treba dati ljudima šta žele, nego šta im treba", njegov je kredo.

U poslednje vreme aktivan je kao član kolektiva TRI, novoformirane grupe di-džejeva i promotera čiji je cilj intenzivnija prezentacija andergraund zvuka po klubovima Srbije.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------

LINE UP:

⚫️ DJ Slavka
⚫️ DJ Dusan Kacarevic
⚫️ Vladimir Erdber
⚫️ DJ Boža Podunavac
